ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] reason for guise of the deceiver to come off?
ygData.msgSnippet: aye, same here hehe.  that s why i didn t say the name of what dropped it. everyone knows it s in trakonon by now anyway.  i also heard it s not a whole lot of
ygData.messageBody:
aye, same here hehe. that's why i didn't say the name of what dropped it.
everyone knows it's in trakonon by now anyway. i also heard it's not a
whole lot of exp during this camp, which is really making me avoid it for
the time being. i don't get to play all that much, so i want to exp when i
can.

Shada


> I'm not supposed to provide spoiler information for
> items my guild
> finds, so I can't provide details. I will say this though:
> it seems to be
> the rare drop, so be prepared for a long camp :(.
> But yes, it's not no drop, so you can pass it around
> and have all
> the rogues and bards in the group in illusion form.
>
> --
> Miriana
> Legions of Darkness
> Innoruuk Server
